name: French in a Flash: Roquefort Roasted Broccoli
description: [Photographs: Kerry Saretsky] Previously Watermelon Salad with Fromage de Chèvre Brulé » All French in a Flash recipes » I have always felt that vegetables are the neglected children of dinnertime. Underloved, underattended, and, unlike children, underwhelming—in most cases. Having...
recipeIngredient: Note:To make baguette crumbs, place torn chunks of any day-old baguette into the food processor, and grind to a rubble. You can keep these sealed in a baggie in the freezer.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, rub together the baguette crumbs, Roquefort, olive oil, lemon zest, and salt and pepper. Toss with the broccoli, and arrange the whole thing on a baking sheet in a flat mound, so the broccoli is all in an even single layer, but touching--this allows the broccoli to catch the melting cheese.
Roast for 30 minutes, turning once. Serve immediately.
